website_summaries.verdict: Simple yet attractive, this canopy bed looks as luxurious as you'll feel sleeping in it.
pros: Offers a center metal rail and two center legs to add extra support to the frame
No box spring or additional foundation required
The slat base keeps your mattress fresher for longer, allowing air to pass freely
cons: A handful of users say this bed isn't as sturdy as they'd like

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASE EVER
customer_reviews.text: WOW - Best purchase I have ever made based on only seeing online before buying. I HIGHLY reccomend this canopy bed to anyone looking for one. All the parts came in one long box, all the tools you need to build it are included, and the instructions were very clear on how to assemble it. My husband and I build it in an hour and a half (and then we got the best sleep of our lives) I have absolutely nothing negative to say about this canopy bed. WE LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Kara A. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Modern. Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 twin sized frames for a shared bedroom for our two girls. Very impressed -- especially for the price. The beds were easy to put together with lettered parts for easy to follow instructions (about an hour or less per bed). One bed came in perfect condition with no manufacturer flaws. The other had one piece that was slightly bent (easily remedied) and a couple flaws, that were only noticeable if you were looking for them. Only complaint is that once the mattress was in place, it slides around a bit and I'm not quite sure how to fix that issue. Great buy. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A.

customer_reviews.title: It’s squeaky but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Aside from this bed frame definitely being a little squeaky especially during adult activities, it’s a great bed frame that looks amazing. I’m 275 lbs and my partner is maybe 180 lbs and the bed holds up well even during said activities. Pro tip: put pillows between the wall and the frame when you're getting it on. Edit: as I use this bed more, the squeaking is definitely... a lot... and I forgot to mention that putting it together was DIFFICULT because the holes for screws aren't totally aligned. I'm wondering if that's contributing to all the squeaking. I'm going to try using some WD40. I'll update if it works.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Loving my new bed
customer_reviews.text: Loving my new bed! It is a monster to put together,so you definitely need two people when putting this together. Like other buyers one of my posts had a small dent in it but it really isn't noticeable. I used a mattress and box spring because I like my bed to sit up high. I would definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Mozie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dark gray
customer_reviews.text: Just finished putting it together, and I had to share how amazing this bed is! Beautiful and sturdy! It is a dark matte grey, and it looks more expensive than it really was. My husband put it together in a few hours by himself, but I had to help once or twice by holding bars in place, simply because it was not physically possible to do it alone at some point. Anyways, very sturdy and pretty bed! I can’t wait to properly decorate it in canopy curtains and fairy lights.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous bed, well made. Assembly with two people ...
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous bed, well made. Assembly with two people took close to 2 hours. Well worth the price, if you are looking for a canopy bed buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Racine

customer_reviews.title: Modern and sleek! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the quality of the bed for the price. It looks modern and sleek. It was easy to put together and feels sturdy. I love the interlocking of the slats. I painted the pink to black and it's perfect for my daughter's room.
customer_reviews.author: smarr

customer_reviews.title: Should have stayed away
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to love it, but unfortunately have to return it. Which seems like a hassle now. Unfortunately this arrived with dents and chips in the paint. Also after a night or two of normal usage and sleep, this bed frame is sooooooo loud and creeks like a bed you’d expect to do after years of use. Also the joints and screws don’t hold because the bed shifts and moves after just a night of use. Save your money and buy something better. It does look kinda nice but that’s about it.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SO FAR
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed on how simple I was able to assemble the bed frame on my own. The bed frame pecies was delivered complete with no damage and the instruction/illustrations was easy to follow. I slept very comfortably and so far it's standing strong for the price I paid. It's looks great in my bedroom and I have taken a picture of my end results for you view. I do recommend this product it you are on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This bed is a two-person assembly. Pieces are heavy so be careful how you stack them. Once the bed is together it is extremely sturdy, but a little squeaky. I have an active sex life with my partner and for the sake of my household, I had to buy WD40 to solve the issue. Other than that it is a wonderful bed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, Gorgeous, BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: Bed is gorgeous!!!!!!!!!! Putting it together was a bit time consuming BUT the directions were very easy to follow! Can't wait to add curtains. Love love LOVE this bed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed on how many parts and how it says 500 lb weight limit and I definitely don't weigh 500 lbs. Not even 300 lbs and the little plastic pieces they have you snap in underneath the bars keep popping out just sitting on it for a few minutes and how easily they break while attempting to install. I had a hard time with the bolts too. They say use this one and it won't fit properly so you grab a new one and it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Tuinstra

customer_reviews.title: Best buy Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I was VERY skeptical. The price was great! But I just wasn't sure about the quality. Instructions were easy. And I put it together myself. Alone. I love it! I love it! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Antoine Tanyhill

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, sturdy and affordable. I LOVE my bed. I bought this in a bundle with the canopy curtains and fairy lights. I was remodeling my bedroom in my apartment and the before is unrecognizable!
customer_reviews.author: Jazmine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This thing took about 45 minutes to assemble. I highly recommend you break out better tools than the little Allen wrench and flat stamped wrench it comes with. It is perfectly fine to use them, but will take a lot longer. The Allen wrench covers most of the hardware. There is seriously hundreds of pieces and intimidating to say the least. We were easily able to construct the frame, just go slow and stay organized. It doesn't creak or move very much at all. The frame feels very strong. You could probably hang on the upper rails (although there are a plethora of stickers saying don't!!!!)
customer_reviews.author: etrick

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is such a fantastic value! It’s very solid and pretty easy to assemble (with two people). There were a few extra fasteners supplied which was very helpful. I liked the attention to detail reflected in the hidden fasteners and crisp design. Yeah, the stickers are *REALLY* hard to remove, but it’s fine. I wore my Fitbit walking around the bed scrubbing those beasts off.
customer_reviews.author: Alli O.

customer_reviews.title: Need better quality control
customer_reviews.text: One of the parts didnt work had it replaced, took two week to get here. Just not happy about it not being right the first time, then having to wait such a long time for the replacement. I had my whole bedroom in the livingroom and was mortified to have anyone see my place.. UPDATE: The part they sent to replace the first one was bent and had to wait another 2 weeks. It's finally together now. It looks good, but you can hear the metal parts moving around. Overall, super disappointed with everything. If its a guest bed I guess it's fine, but for daily use, find something better.
customer_reviews.author: Shellbee Love

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter Canopy
customer_reviews.text: The headboard of the frame arrived with a few dents and dings. It's a metal frame not quite easy to pop out and surface. The instructions were easy to follow, assembly time was between 30-45 minutes. It sits low to the floor, about 10.5 inches from frame base to floor. It's not extravagant, however for the price it works. It would probably be perfect for kids room or starter bed. For more mature look, you may want to invest in a higher quality canopy bed.
customer_reviews.author: miKtastic

customer_reviews.title: Great but two small manufacturers errors
customer_reviews.text: The best is very good for the price. It took me and my husband about two hours to put together. The instructions were easy to read. Only about 10 cuss words and two alcoholic beverages are required because On One piece of the bed two holes weren’t large enough for the hardware. However, we contacted the company for replacement. We will see how quickly they respond! Most importantly my six year old seems to love the new bed!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this bed frame
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bed frame. I bought this and had my friend and I put it together in 2 hours. lol we messed up quite a bit. I'll have to post a picture of the finished product but I LOVE going to sleep in my bed. I decorated it with silk flowers and sheer black drapes. my friends call it my " Japanese princess bed" hahaha. I cannot tell you how much I LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Tomoko

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed but...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bed but makes lots of noises. I’v Had this bed for a year now but my daughter just started sleeping on it for a month now. I lay down with her to put her to sleep and once she’s asleep I will try to move to leave and the noise will wake her up. I tightened all the screws already twice but didn’t work. This bed would have been perfect but the squeaky noise would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: E. T.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed, great value, beautiful color...buuuutttt 1. There are soooooooo many parts lol 2. I put it together by myself, took me about 3hrs 3. I do not like how the bed frame is put together, the design needs to be flipped 4. Most importantly this is NOT the same bed as the one pictured...the one in the picture has a foot board...this bed does not 5. There are no screw caps...so there are silver screws in gold metal...not a good look

customer_reviews.title: Great bed with a few small issues
customer_reviews.text: I love how cute this bed is and that we can store stuff underneath. We put curtains on it so that I can sleep while my boyfriend plays video games in our room. It definitely serves its purpose and looks great. It came and the frame was slightly off making it extremely difficult to screw in some of the screws. It was a 2 person job for sure. The instructions are not great and good luck finding curtains that don’t cost an arm and a leg to put on this bed. We wanted to put decent light blocking curtains and we’ve spent over $100 on curtains that are the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the price fool you
customer_reviews.text: I was dubious at first because of the awesome price point. But after it was put together I was very impressed with the product. Only one problem, the leg at the foot of the bed was slightly dented but the paint was okay. The dent is about 10" off the floor so I hardly notice it. I think it must have happened in shipping. It's a great modern statement to our modern home. And very sturdy. It was easy to put together, took about 1 1/2 hours. I was able to put a white mosquito net over it and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: The Fighting Lutefisk

customer_reviews.title: Very cute bed
customer_reviews.text: When we received the bed pieces in the mail some of the bars were dented and scratched and other parts were missing. When I emailed the company they were polite and efficient in mailing me replacement bars. No complaints here! The bed is exactly as I expected
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice bed for my daughter she loves it i bought the full size gold color
customer_reviews.author: anairis

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality and more soli
customer_reviews.text: For the price this Really surprised me. Got the grey color but is actually quite nice. The bummer about it is it did take me some time to put it together. Probably 3 hours but done right. The hard part now is getting a nice cover for sides and back. Star thing for 60 bucks I got for my daughter. What a joke. Buy a yard of fabric then... but the bed frame itself... really truly quality. Forget price it us quality. That said... to carry it up the stairs... My God it is Heavy. Two people will have problems. Heavy but steal so I don't care. Will last firever forever firever.
customer_reviews.author: Black

customer_reviews.title: No scheduled delivery, buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: UPS dumped the 110 lbs box on the downstairs landing for my condo building and ran. A neighbor tried to stop UPS before he got into his truck but the driver smiled and continued to his vehicle completely ignoring the delivery instructions. Pieces of the bed frame were poking out of the box but nothing was damaged or missing. No not order this item if you need it brought directly to you front door. Some of the holes do no match up for assembly which decreases the stability of the bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: Love it and very easy to put together! Had a mix up on the first initial order; some how we received a bunk bed lol but everyone, the manufacturer and amazon were great with getting it shipped back and the correct one sent.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not bad putting together with 2 people and organizing different piles of each item before starting. Took about 3 hours. Between the mattress/ box spring, memory foam, my fiance, pitbull, and I (well over the 500 pound recommended weight limit) it holds well/ sturdy. Not silent during extracurricular activities with sqeaking lol but not loud. Plus we live alone so we are less concerned about the noise. Beautiful tho and decently high with the layers. Good underbed storage too. Great purchase and highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Squeaky
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed frame mostly because i read reviews where they bed isnt squeaky even duringh.....intimate time... This is not the case for me at all. I followed the directions to a tee and even when I roll over in the bed it squeaks. It also came with some scratched and dented pieces. It's just okay. I love the look of it. hate how squeaky it is. I don't know if there is a way i can fix it but ill come back with an update if I figure something out.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Damaged parts!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm unable to finish putting the bed together because of bent parts. There were a few and I managed to use them anyway but one of the upper canopy pieces is severely damaged and I can't complete the bed because of it. Called customer service and they said it'll take 4-7 days to receive a replacement part. The process to get the part though is such a long email of proof of purchase and pictures.... A huge inconvenience. They should have quality control done on the parts BEFORE they are packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole K

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the bed. Took a while for my husband and I to put together. But it’s very sturdy. We did notice some rattling of the support bars on the main center foundation bar. We cut and laid some non slip rubber that you would lay under a rug on the center metal bar that the bars go across. And no more rattling. I do wish there was one more bar for the headboard. But for the most part really love the bed especially for the price! Would recommend and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: I'm in Love!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so in love with this bed! I took a bit of a risk because it had mixed reviews but I'm so happy i did! This seriously looks like a designer bed that costs thousands of dollars. The box was extremely heavy and had so many pieces but every piece was carefully labeled making it way easier to put together than most IKEA furniture. We used a drill rather than the tools the bed came with and I think because of that the bed is super sturdy. The pieces arrived with no scratches, dents or chips. I love my new bed!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: It is working
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a sturdy frame which is safe! Some pieces were not formed correctly though. Some screws were tighter to put in. One hole was not aligned correctly so the screw could not go in. Then another screw was not formed correctly to allow the utensil to fit correctly to tighten properly. It was a pretty big piece. You can mostly put this together by yourself but there was a few points were my husband and I held pieces up to easily put it all together. disassembling seems easy enough although we definitely dont want to any time soon
customer_reviews.author: illyana morales

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but a BEAST to put together
customer_reviews.text: The bed frame is amazing and a great value. Just note, it is HEAVY. You will want 2 people to move the box. You will also want as many hands as possible to put it together. With the weight and complexity, expect it to take some time. Noted that on mine (also saw in other reviews) some of the screw holes do not line up. So there is one screw that just couldn't be added. However, once the beast is all put together, it's super sturdy and looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: We got it on time. The box was fairly mangled but everything inside seemed fine. We took everything out, had all the pieces. While putting it together one of the pieces was slightly bent. It took a long time with pliers it still wouldn't fit. Finally just ended up hammering it into place. Everything else assembled fine. Didn't take super long. Just grumpy about the piece and transport.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Groshong

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed because it was inexpensive and I really wanted a canopy bed. I needed help to set it up, but we got it together. The bed has these clips that go between the bars to prevent it from squeaking. One of the clips popped out, and it was VERY squeaky until I literally just stuck the clip back in and it's quiet again. It wasn't hard to do. I've been using this bed frame without a box spring for two months now- it's the perfect height, no squeaking and it's still very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: J's mama

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Bed Frame!
customer_reviews.text: My mattress is super thick but I absolutely love this bed frame and how elevated it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jlin

customer_reviews.title: Good Inexpensive Bed Frame
customer_reviews.text: We were able to put this bed frame together in an hour. The only part that I feel is not super sturdy is the bottom that holds the mattress. It is fine for holding the mattress and getting on and off the bed. However, it's a little bouncy and noisy for more rigorous physical activities. We paid a good price for it in comparison to other similar bed frames. I did A LOT of comparison shopping. I also bought during Labor Day weekend so that probably helped with the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Washington Irving

customer_reviews.title: Simple clean and Sturdy budget buy.
customer_reviews.text: Bed arrived within a week. It took about an hour t it together with 2 people. The instructions were simple to understand (mostly just pictures) tools were provided. The bed came together quite nicely. It is very sturdy. It was for my 20 year old nieces first apartment. No box spring needed. She got a nice 12 inch pillow top mattress and combined the height is good. Will post pictures once the curtains are up. Great Buy on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Aqua

customer_reviews.title: This is a great Bed!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant after read a few reviews but I decided to bite the bullet, and I am SOOOO glad I did. Everything came in a long but thin box, easy for getting into an apartment by myself. The packaging was phenomenal, everything is marked and the manual was easy to follow. I did use a drill and bit to get the screw work done faster. After this bed was put together it was super sturdy and looks AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: WARNING - AVOID this product.
customer_reviews.text: My worst order from Amazon to date. Product arrived with manufacturer defective parts that half way through have made building the bed impossible. Manufacturer wants 12 weeks to ship a replacement part. AVOID AVOID AVOID.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great frame for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Finished it in about 40 minutes. The grey is lighter than the pictures but I knew that from the comments. It's a great frame for the price, I watched it price change a few times but mostly was 175, I swooped in and got it at 140. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: StephFL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality at a stand out price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, nice contemporary design, easy to follow instructions. I'd recommend using a regular Allen wrech when building it, though. The included one is pretty easy to chew up and you'll be going to the garage to get a real one pretty fast. But that isn't a knock on the bed at all. It's sturdy and well designed. Minimum creaking compared to what I expected from previous metal framed beds that I've purchased in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared for a bit of work.
customer_reviews.text: Love the frame and they grey color, perfect for the room. It is also very stable. Only issue was one of the key frame pieces was very difficult to attach. It would have been impossible to do with the provided Allen wrench. I have a screwdriver set that includes the right bit and it was the only way I could force the screw in. While it might be possible to assemble this alone, I would advise having some assistance. If for nothing else, have them there to offer stability while you fit all the pieces together.
customer_reviews.author: Tami W

customer_reviews.title: Attention to the details. :)
customer_reviews.text: My roommate helped me put this together...2 girls...but we did it. It is heavy and there are a lot of little pieces, so we are sore, but...I was impressed with the quality. Part of my frame was a little bent, but I think it will be okay. What impressed me were the little details. I wish I took a picture...I'll update my review when I move in just under a year. There are what...20 slats...and each slat was held in place by 8 plastic pieces connecting it to the other metal pieces around it. This was my first piece of furniture I've built, but my friend said that it was relatively simple compared to others she had seen.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Rizor

customer_reviews.title: Best bedframe I've EVER owned!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bedframe! Hundreds of times better than anything I've purchased from ikea! It has supported my fiancé and I for over a year now (almost 450lbs combined) and there are basically no signs of wear! Took it apart and put it back together for a move across the city and it's still so perfect! Bolts hold on so tight and don't squeak. Headboard doesn't hit the wall and make noise at all when we're "jumping around" like our ikea frame did! I love this bedframe!!! I NEVER imagined I would get furniture this good from Amazon! Plus it's a WAY better price than ikea too! So well made and super stylish too!!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, impressed with the assembly.
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy with the assembly and instructions on this bed. I do a lot of furniture assembly and this was well done-instructions are clear and though they send you extra parts I didn’t need them. I was able to do 80% of it on my own and my husband had to help me with a few steps in the middle to assemble the top that I was too short to reach and because it’s just too large too manage on your own toward the end. Great quality and I was a little worried about the metal frame feeling cheap but it wasn’t at all. Bought this for my 6 year old and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Great bed but it never shuts up!
customer_reviews.text: It's been about a year. This was easy for me to assemble on my own even though it requires two people. My only issue is the irritating squeak.Like.....it never shuts up!!! It's worse when you have RLS and have to tap your foot constantly at night in order to fall asleep. I might throw it away when I move in some years and just get a platform. :( I don't want to though
customer_reviews.author: Everything Emma

customer_reviews.title: was pleased with the quality for $152
customer_reviews.text: was pleased with the quality for $152.94. I used this frame with Classic brands queen sized adjustable base and matress. I did elevate the frame on furniture blocks mostly to look better with the tall ceiling
customer_reviews.author: The Penguin Popper

customer_reviews.title: Visible screws make this bed look cheap and does not match the seller's photos.
customer_reviews.text: This assembled bed is sturdy and easy to assemble but it does _not_ match seller's photos because the real life bed has silver metal screw heads that really detract from the visuals of the bed. Seller's photos of this bed do _not_ show the silver screw heads and that is deliberately misleading of the seller. I chose this bed and paid more money for it because competitor's bed showed screws and the photos for this bed did not. I could have saved money by buying competitor's product. I am a creative person and will deal with the exposed screw heads but am also complaining to Amazon and seller to ask for a discount for inaccurate and misleading photos.
customer_reviews.author: SF_Living

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but sturdy, classic frame.
customer_reviews.text: This frame is extremely sturdy however when I received it a few of the pieces had minor dents in them. The frame has many pieces connecting the base to the rest of the frame which makes this a very sturdy bed (I can do pull-ups off of the top bars and the bed does not move). ... <--- not recommending this.. just sayin' :) Update: 3/14/16: I have had this bed since August of 2015 and still no problems, no squeaking (as someone mentioned in a previous review). This bed has been just as sturdy as when I first put it together. Still a great buy in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: The Bees Knees

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and high end look
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bed. Heavier then we thought. We had to remove the poles at the bottom of the stairs in the hall of my apartment building and carry the pieces up out the box. The delivery guy to me it was super heavy. Of course me being the I can do anything women I am I didn’t believe that until I tried to left the box! It is a beautiful bed the color is what makes it stand out. It’s glamorous especially when you add the bedding. My daughter and sister purchased the same bed different color. I put all three together with little to no assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jennelle Darden

customer_reviews.title: Add style & glam to your bedroom. Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love my purchase. Take me some time to get help assembling it. Very easy to put together to two people one hour to put it together. Very sturdy, not to mention that it is a stunning bed. Very happy with my purchase, would highly recommend this item to anyone wanting to add some Style and glam to the bedroom.....The bed is Even prettier in person. Will add photos once the room is completed. Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, lovely
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is a sturdy bed. I was worried, with it being metal, that it would freak & squeak, but not at all! It’s easy to assemble- my 15 year old daughter assembled it by herself in about an hour. I suspect it would’ve taken less time, but there were plenty of Snapchat breaks! I got a queen size in gold, which is a lovely, matt gold colour. The sheer scarf also came from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Do this to reduce squeaking
customer_reviews.text: This was squeaky as heck when installed following the directions. I took the bolts off, placed a thin rubber gasket on each, and placed a drop of WD40. No more squeaks, excellent frame.
customer_reviews.author: ShadowGodOfWar

customer_reviews.title: Cute bed but...
customer_reviews.text: This bed is so adorable however it is extremely heavy (when delivered in box). Please make sure that you have someone with you who can help you move it around and assemble it. The other issue we had was with the delivery of the item. The frame arrived bent even though the box was not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Evans Family

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces making it useless
customer_reviews.text: So this is the second time I bought this frame. I loved the first one which is why I bought the exact same one when I got a king. The first one was perfect. Strong, didn't squeak once retightened. The second one was missing major parts that support the canopy making it possible to use but impossible to be fully supported. And it squeaks terribly. I'm in the process of getting the parts and the web site is intensely difficult to use and I have no idea when the pieces will get here. I'll update when I finally get them.
customer_reviews.author: Tony coz

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Canopy Bed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 year old daughter so I could create a girly fort/bed for her. The materials seem of very high quality. It was very easy to put together, as the instructions were easy to follow and every item was very well labelled. I bought some sheer curtains from Amazon and slid them through the top bars before I assembled the bed. My daughter absolutely loves her bed and it looks like it will be be able to last her until her early teens. I (and my daughter) are very happy with this bed.
customer_reviews.author: P.L.

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces/ Will not Last
customer_reviews.text: I assembled the bed and found on of the cross support poles was missing. Just was not included. Would 5 star if the company would respond to my emails....but nothing. Update - 1/29/2020 The bed squeaks like crazy now. Any time you even think about moving while in or around this bed, it makes loud noises. Also the mattress slides very easy over the metal slats, allowing the mattress to fall off the foot end of the bed. This bed has been such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: christopher chaney

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy if your over 80lbs! The middle bars and legs all bent within days of having this bed, and that was with just me sleeping on it my husband works nights. Beautiful bed but not built to withstand weight at all
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Color was not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Frame arrived early which Is nice but it wasn't at all the color I expected. it was as much darker color. Not the shiny bright color in the pictures. It was such a terrible color but the frame itself was exactly what I wanted so I chose to spray paint it the color I wanted and it came out perfectly. The assembly was so easy to put together but there are A LOT of pieces. In the photo I've included, the bar on the left is what I spray painted, the bar on the right is what the bar actually looks like!
customer_reviews.author: Kinza Kooner

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy love the color got this for my 2 yr olds bed i love that if she jumps on it i can trust that it wont break. Took about an hour to put together with 2 people. It is big and will grow with her im happy with my purchase. I gave it 4 stars because one of the bars was a little bent and some of them didnt line up correctly it was a pain in the butt to force in but overall is good
customer_reviews.author: allie

customer_reviews.title: VERY sturdy and well built
customer_reviews.text: VERY sturdy and well built, but be mindful of how low the hight is. My canopy hangs down about a foot, and to not hit my head on the canopy I have to duck quite a bit (and I'm only 5'5"). All in all, good for a kid or for deciding whether you want a canopy bed, but not a "forever" choice. Generally rather ugly and I wish it were 2 feet taller. HOWEVER, activity on the bed does not make noises or shake the whole bed, it's VERY sturdy and doesn't shift as I sit down or get up. Well designed/built, no creaking.
customer_reviews.author: LittleFiddle05

customer_reviews.title: Best Bed Investment!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so in love with this bed and just so happy that I decided on blush gold and white as my room color. It's so calm, relaxing, and airy. I hired someone to put the bed together for me. I wanted it done right and without any frustration. He did an amazing job. I read a few reviews where it say it didn't come with one of the poles for the footboard as pictured, mine is put definitely just as pictured. Glad I decided on the canopy bed. I mean I knew I wanted it as soon as I saw it. Happy with my purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shakita Herder

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhhh don't buy
customer_reviews.text: The frame itself is sturdy, I had a handy man assemble it so not sure how difficult that was. The bed came damaged based on poor packaging and had stickers ALL over that were very difficult to remove. I get placing one sticker that says do not hang but 4 on each side of the canopy? COME ON... also, once removed the stickers have a shadow of where they were which does NOT go away! See attached photos. I'm keeping the frame only because it's already been put together and it's temporary but I would NOT biy this frame again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but difficult to take apart !
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I can finally write a review about this. So I first purchased this close to two years ago! & I love the way it looks! The negative is those frames are HEAVY and difficult to take apart. Over time the nails that are given with the set wear out and require a drill to take apart. I just moved and it was quite difficult getting this apart so that’s why I’m giving 3 times. Because I am hoping I don’t have to buy new screws every time I need to put it back together. 🥺
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Should NOT be Used by Adults
customer_reviews.text: This bed is very flimsy and week. The assembly was tedious and unclear and honestly it’s not a bed for adults. The joints don’t stay tight it creeks every time you move. If you choose to engage in any strenuous activity on this bed it shakes more than a junkie on a school bus...don’t buy it
customer_reviews.author: tsmyth

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky!
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy box! Good luck getting it up stairs lol. Some pieces were minority dented and/or missing chips of paint. Nothing that mattered very much. It took about 4 hours to put together w/ the help of 1 other person. The metal is pretty decent quality. It's pretty. I also love the height. There's enough room that I can easily slide underneath to vacuum. UPDATE: It's squeaking sooo much :'( I'm going to try to tighten everything because it's ridiculous. My housemates probably hate me now because they can hear my bed every time I 'get down' lmao
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Noisiest bed ever
customer_reviews.text: I hate this bed so much. It squeaks relentlessly. It looks nice enough (though not as tall as it looks). It's a decent price. But it's so creaky. Every toss and turn. I can't stand it.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the Price
customer_reviews.text: It’s not really gold but it’ll do it’s not study at all squeaks every time you move but I’m used to it because all metal canopy beds do that no matter how tight you make the screws I bought a California king mattress I was scared it was going to be too big but and it’s too short I have gaps so I have to get another one definitely get a box spring because your mattress will slip through the bars make sure you read the bed measurements before you get a mattress you need like a 85Wx78.5L mattress but read the bed details to make sure I’m right
customer_reviews.author: Kee

customer_reviews.title: NOISY!! PLASTIC PIECES KEEP FALLING OUT OF THE BOTTOM THAT ARE MEANT TO SUPPORT THE FRAME
customer_reviews.text: I honestly do love this bed. Looks amazing. But. It is Soooo loud! When I first got it, it wasnt Noisy at all but after having it for a few weeks... oh my. I can’t even move in my sleep without getting woken up by the noise by it. On top of that, when you build the bed it comes With these plastic pieces that support under the mattress, these metal bars that go into the frame, those little plastic pieces keep falling out. The bed hasn’t broken yet but man when I tell you when lose pieces fall out it sure As heck sounds like you’re about to fall and the whole bed is about to break.
customer_reviews.author: CAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This bed frame is beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This bed frame is beautiful and sturdy. Came in a very long package and it's pretty heavy for just one person. My hubby helped me bring it to the room and I assembled this myself. Took about 2 hours because I had to move stuff around but I'm only 5' and 110lbs. If my hubby was home or had 2 people to assemble this, it would have been easily done. I give this item 10plus stars. I got the white to match an all white room, I'm super pleased and can't wait to start adding lights or flowers around to make it my own style! Tres chic!
customer_reviews.author: Mimiluvsravens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The headboard and foot-board does not look as pictured, but other than that, this bed-frame was perfect! It was very easy to put together, with very clearly labeled instructions and it was packaged as simply as possible without marring the pieces. It's a gorgeous and sturdy bedframe at a great price! You will need help putting it together and carrying it into your house, as it is very heavy and cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: loliguh

customer_reviews.title: Nice but squeaky
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed. It is very cute and sturdy. My only issue with it is how squeaky it is. Im not quite sure how to fix this but it gets really annoying with every move it squeaks. Other than the noise I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this junk
customer_reviews.text: Pretty terrible quality. It came dinged up and had dents in it. Little marks on it as well. You absolutely need two people to put it together, don’t even try to do it by yourself. It’s super squeaky and doesn’t feel sturdy at all. Spend a bit more on a better quality bed. Don’t waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I decided to redo our bedroom a few months ago. I never got around to writing a review on this bed but it’s AMAZING! I’ve always dreamt of a canopy bed! It’s so beautiful and so nice to wake up in every day. It’s held up really well over the past few months. We got the king size for our king sized Memory foam mattress (Which is extremely heavy). Together my husband and I weigh about 300lbs, our kids sit in it with us daily and we haven’t had any problems at all, it’s very sturdy! There’s also room underneath for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Krysten

customer_reviews.title: This bed was my first great adventure in the wonderful world of furniture assembly while ...
customer_reviews.text: This bed was my first great adventure in the wonderful world of furniture assembly while single. The box clearly states two or more people are recommended to set it up, but I am stubborn and decided to tackle it myself after two weeks of the box just leaning up against my wall. I was able to successfully put this together by myself, but I would not recommend it, as it is very heavy, and when (it WILL happen) you realize something is upside down, it is very heartbreaking to undo your progress and start again. The product itself is very nice, the bed frame is sturdy, modern and a gorgeous piece to have in the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: squibb17

customer_reviews.title: Bent Bars and Incomplete Bed
customer_reviews.text: I can honestly say that this was a rather unfortunate buy. When I opened the box the bars were bent. At first, I didn't think much of it, until I started putting it together. The bent base bars made it obnoxiously difficult to align the holes...which turned this 45 minute project into a 4.5 hour project. After I got to the last step, I came to the conclusion that the feet to the corner base bars, as well as the two center stabilizer bars, were not sent. This product received a one-star for exactly that reason. The product was incomplete and the pieces were bent.
customer_reviews.author: Custom

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for Wonderful Quality! No Squeaks so far!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy! Easy Set up, and just as Pictured! :) This was a wonderful addition to the Guest Room. I would recommend this product for sure! As others stated just make sure you're aware it's a dark grey, as it does look kind of black in the picture. Expect a delay in delivery though, this is a super heavy package and because of that I think they had to make sure two men were on the delivery truck to help get it up the driveway, I've seen a lot of (1) day delays with these heavier items, so just be aware :) .
customer_reviews.author: LemonyScabs

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Beyond expectations for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast. Took me about 2 1/2 hours to assemble (by myself). It was hard work but the directions were clear and easy to understand. The bed is extremely sturdy and I have zero noise problems that I’ve seen others complain about, maybe they just didn’t tighten the screws enough. My kids tend to come in my room and play on the bars sometimes but still standing strong. Plus the look is very chic and relaxing. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute bed but we'll see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great price. This bed looks great and is fairly easy to set up. We purchased for our 6 year old daughter, based on the great reviews. Cons: The metal slats/bars are super thin. I don't see this holding up for your average (active) kid for a long time. It's lightweight, which probably explains the cheaply made slats. On the plus side, you can return it if it doesn't work for you. I gave it 3 stars because of how cheaply made the slats/bars are. I'll update in a few more months, once I see how well it actually holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal D

customer_reviews.title: Not for light slee
customer_reviews.text: Fist off, my husband and I LOVE this frame. It's sleek, modern and masculine enough for both of us. It is easy to put together, and didn't take very long to do so. After about a week, we started noticing the noise. This is my reason for the 4 star review. Every toss and turn creeks the metal. Every jostle makes the frame squeal. We still love this bed, you will know whenever your partner moves. Not for the ultra light sleepers out there.
customer_reviews.author: QueenGutterdoll

customer_reviews.title: Not the bed in product photo!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely bed, but now what’s shown in product display photo, is no foot bar and it’s not the shiny gold, is more bronze looking. I would recommend buying some washers to stabilize the bed, it’s makes a little noise when there is movement. The bed is great for standard height ceilings, kinda wish the canopy bars were a bit taller. Overall, I’m happy with my purchase, but I want others to know what to expect. Also, it’s VERY heavy and you’ll need 2-3 people to put it all together.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Bed creaks a wee bit, but otherwise great
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-priced canopy bed. It took a long time for my stepfather to assemble it, even given his advanced skills. It ended up being a little creaky, so I had to go back and manually tighten everything a day after assembly. It seems to creak a bit still now, which could be just because it is metal. Luckily it is for a child and not adults. Even slight creaking could get obnoxious quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Happiest Vacations

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful frame.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bed frame. Goes perfect with my plum purple bed set. Only issue was some parts came damaged, which isn’t the company’s fault. UPS is very careless about how they handle packages. I know because my brother used to work there. I contacted the company and they sent our replacement parts that i received in 4 days. But this frame is very sturdy and took me about 45 mins to put it together alone.
customer_reviews.author: Nira

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bed. I like the fact that this canopy bed came in metal. My daughter wanted a bed like mines. This one was reasonable and sturdy. It squeaks a little but I might need to tighten the screws. I still recommend this bed
customer_reviews.author: I shop too much

customer_reviews.title: Loooveee itttt
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed. It took me, my boyfriend, and one other person about an hour to put together. This would be incredibly challenging to put together on your own, but not impossible. It's simple to assemble, but heavy. I was a little worried about not having a box spring and it does make it closer to the ground than if you were to use one, but not any less comfortable. It was easy to put the curtains on too and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Great bed design for my studio space
customer_reviews.text: The queen bed was shipped in a very long and heavy box and required extra help dragging it from the curb into the apartment. My hired handy man was able to assemble the frame in 90 mins with power tools. The bed frame design looks great in our studio space with its tall ceilings and helps create a defined sleeping "zone". I also purchased the Zinus Sleep Master By iCoil 12" Support Plus Spring Mattress, Queen from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: toledopirate

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not remotely sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed but: Many of the pieces arrived scratched. One of the posts on the footboard where the top frame connected needed to be bent back into shape. The bed is twisted and doesn’t align right so there’s only two of the big four legs at a time touching the ground. You have to be really careful getting in or it feels like it could flip and one end slams into the floor. It feels like the horizontal cross beams are under immense pressure and curved to fit the frame. The whole thing creaks like a submarine under pressure. I love this bed, it’s gorgeous and fits my room really well. I really wish it was better built.
customer_reviews.author: Aila Moireach

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This purchase has been great from begining to end. I was extremly impressed with the condition this bed arrived in. Everything was packed nicely and secure. Everything was clearly labeled and the instructions were very easy to follow. I was easily able to assemble it in about an hour but would definitely recommend someone helping to make it easier. Once the bed was assembled it was clear this is a sturdy bed. I would highly reccommend this bed to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Laughner

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sturdy bed! Slight challenges during assembly concerning lower side rails remember the lower head and foot rails screw on the bottom of the lower vertical rails NOT the top!
customer_reviews.author: S. C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Took an hour for two people to put together. The instructions are easy to follow. The box was really heavy so we just took the pieces out of the box , to move it. The gold finish is gorgeous. Beautiful canopy frame now I just need the curtains.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We received this bed frame as a wedding gift and we love it! It's solid and doesn't require a box spring. Assembly is really easy as well as dis-assembly. We ended up moving and had to dis-assemble the bed frame to get it out of our basement apartment and the whole process was a lot easier than we were anticipating. There's plenty of space to store things underneath as well so is actually space saving.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Modern Style but still feel like a Princess!
customer_reviews.text: It came in a really long, heavy Box ( that I needed help moving ) and put it together right away about 90 % on my own. Took a little over 2 hrs, putting the headboard, footboard and actual canopy sections together were the only parts that I needed help ( sections were just too wide to hold up alone ). Aside from that it was easy putting together, creaks a little when two people are in it but sturdy overall. Has a nice space underneath for storage that I love. Happy to finally have a canopy bed I always wanted :)
customer_reviews.author: S. Welch

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: This bed is great my girlfriend loves it As for the people who said wits loud or squeaks, I don’t hear a peep from mine. I would guess they didn’t tighten the screws tight enough I used my drill and it was pretty quick to put together just make sure you have an xtra set of hands
customer_reviews.author: joei006

customer_reviews.title: athletic or by no means in good shape) by myself up two flights of stairs
customer_reviews.text: First off, this is a 100lb package, I had the luxury of caring this myself (I am not jacked, athletic or by no means in good shape) by myself up two flights of stairs. Took me like 2 hours!! It sucked. But! Once the herculean feat was accomplished, I began construction of the frame! My lord, sooo sooo easy!! And it’s actuallt unbleavably stunning!! Looks beautiful!! Wish it was a little taller cause I have such high ceelings but, I’ll tell you, super easy to put together and it looks stunning!! Love it!! Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Dhanrahan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build even for one person
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy built this by myself and made sure to measure my ceiling height I cleared the bed by 1” so if your in the same situation and only have one inch to spare it will fit and work great. Also super sturdy and easy to build even for one person took me about 3hrs by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This bed is amazing. You save money on not needing to get a box spring or a headboard, and it looks amazing. It's quiet and doesn't creak ever. It looks great. It takes a hot minute to assemble, but it isn't hard, just time-consuming. I would absolutely get it again.
customer_reviews.author: anon

product_meta.title: DHP Modern Canopy Bed Frame, Classic Design, Queen Size, Grey
product_meta.description: Color:Grey| Size:QueenA classic design reinvented, simplicity and style combined are the hallmarks of the DHP modern canopy metal bed. Its sleek square lines finished in a rich, gun metal gray has a timeless look perfect for any setting. Featuring 22 metal slats to provide support and comfort, this bed does not require a box spring or additional foundation. Pair the canopy bed with curtains for a romantic, personal touch. Whatever your style, the DHP modern canopy metal bed is magical in every way.
feature_bullets: Grey metal framed, industrial canopy bedframe-fantastic design
Square lines for a timeless look, Includes 22 metal slats to provide support and comfort
Sleek, modern and industrial designed silhouette
Sturdy metal frame construction, Slats spaced 2.5 inches apart
Metal side rails for guaranteed stability and durability, Weight limit 500 lbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,707 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
